name.baseName: cement production;cement, portland cement;new suspension preheater kiln
水泥研磨;水泥, 硅酸盐水泥;新型悬浮预热器

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: In the cement-milling phase for the new suspension preheater (NSP) kiln, clinker, gypsum, and other mixed materials are milled together into particles of a certain size, and the final product as cement is formed. In contrast with the shaft kiln, the clinker in the NSP kiln stems mainly from the “continuous baking and grinding” phase (100 tons/h), with only a very small part originating from the clinker storage of the previous production phase (2 tons/h). The total clinker thus amounts to 102 tons/h. The input in the NSP kiln contains no water.The NSP kiln is a production system of high efficiency, good production continuity, high output, and low overall energy consumption. In addition, with better dust collection and noise elimination equipment, the production system of the NSP kiln can greatly reduce the consumption of resources and pollutant emissions.

在新型悬浮预热器（New suspension preheater，NSP）窑的水泥磨粉阶段，熟料、石膏和其他混合材料被一起磨成特定大小的颗粒，形成最终产品——水泥。与立窑相比，NSP窑中的熟料主要来自“连续烧结和磨碎”阶段（100吨/小时），只有极少部分来自前一生产阶段的熟料储存（2吨/小时）。因此，总熟料量为102吨/小时。NSP窑的输入不含水。NSP窑是一个高效、生产连续性好、产量高、总体能源消耗低的生产系统。此外，通过更好的除尘和降噪设备，NSP窑的生产系统可以大大减少资源消耗和污染物排放。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Compared with the shaft kiln, the NSP kiln is a production system of high efficiency, good production continuity, high output, and low overall energy consumption. In addition, with better dust collection and noise elimination equipment, the production system of the NSP kiln can greatly reduce the consumption of resources and pollutant emissions.In the cement-milling phase for the NSP kiln, clinker, gypsum, and other mixed materials are milled together into particles of a certain size, and the final product as cement is formed. In contrast with the shaft kiln, the clinker in the NSP kiln stems mainly from the “continuous baking and grinding” phase (100 tons/h), with only a very small part originating from the clinker storage of the previous production phase (2 tons/h). The total clinker thus amounts to 102 tons/h. Another difference between the shaft kiln and the NSP kiln is that the input in the NSP kiln contains no water.

Compared with the shaft kiln, the NSP kiln is a production system of high efficiency, good production continuity, high output, and low overall energy consumption. In addition, with better dust collection and noise elimination equipment, the production system of the NSP kiln can greatly reduce the consumption of resources and pollutant emissions.In the cement-milling phase for the NSP kiln, clinker, gypsum, and other mixed materials are milled together into particles of a certain size, and the final product as cement is formed. In contrast with the shaft kiln, the clinker in the NSP kiln stems mainly from the “continuous baking and grinding” phase (100 tons/h), with only a very small part originating from the clinker storage of the previous production phase (2 tons/h). The total clinker thus amounts to 102 tons/h. Another difference between the shaft kiln and the NSP kiln is that the input in the NSP kiln contains no water.
technology.technologicalApplicability: The NSP kiln's cement production process is designed for the manufacturing of Portland cement, a commonly used binder in various types of construction. The high-efficiency milling phase where clinker, gypsum, and other materials are ground is specifically employed for the production of high-quality cement, suitable for construction projects that require reliable and durable cement.
新型悬浮预热器窑的水泥生产过程专为硅酸盐水泥（常见的建筑粘合剂）的制造而设计。其中高效的磨粉阶段将熟料、石膏和其他材料进行研磨，专门用于生产高质量的水泥，适用于需要可靠和耐久水泥的建筑项目。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The system boundary is the grinding stage where cement is produced.
系统边界为产生水泥的研磨阶段。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Dan Hu, Zhen Guo, Zhen Wang, & Qiang Xiao. (2015). Metabolism analysis and eco-environmental impact assessment of two typical cement production systems in Chinese enterprises. Ecological Informatics 26, 70–77.

Dan Hu, Zhen Guo, Zhen Wang, & Qiang Xiao. (2015). Metabolism analysis and eco-environmental impact assessment of two typical cement production systems in Chinese enterprises. Ecological Informatics 26, 70–77.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set for the NSP kiln's cement production process, consider the efficient and continuous nature of the system, as well as its high output and low energy consumption. Special attention should be given to the advanced dust collection and noise reduction technologies implemented, which contribute to the reduction of resource consumption and emissions. Users must account for these factors when comparing this process with less efficient alternatives, such as the shaft kiln. The data set specifically pertains to the milling phase, and users should ensure that the system boundary is properly defined and maintained in their assessments.
在使用新型悬浮预热器窑水泥生产过程的生命周期评估数据集时，请考虑系统的高效连续性、高产出和低能耗的特点。应特别注意实施的先进除尘和降噪技术，这些技术有助于减少资源消耗和排放。用户在将此过程与效率较低的替代方案（如立窑）进行比较时，必须考虑这些因素。数据集特别适用于研磨阶段，用户应确保在评估中正确定义和维护系统边界。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Dust. The particle size is not specified. Here we treat it as PM>10.
灰尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
